description: Information for those with limited income and resources (those who may qualify for or already have the Low Income Subsidy to lower their prescription drug coverage costs). Information for people who may qualify for extra help, people losing their automatic eligibility for the extra help, people with a change in their extra help co-payment level, people Medicare will reassign to a new plan, and people who chose their own plan.
keyword: Publically Available Data File - for download
title: Limited Income and Resources
